name: align-content
desc: Specifies the alignment between the lines inside a flexible container when the items do not use all available space

name: align-items
desc: Specifies the alignment for items inside a flexible container

name: align-self
desc: Specifies the alignment for selected items inside a flexible container

name: all
desc: Resets all properties (except unicode-bidi and direction)

name: animation
desc: A shorthand property for all the animation-* properties

name: animation-delay
desc: Specifies when the animation will start

name: animation-direction
desc: Specifies whether an animation should play in reverse direction or alternate cycles

name: animation-duration
desc: Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds an animation takes to complete one cycle

name: animation-fill-mode
desc: Specifies a style for the element when the animation is not playing (before it starts, after it ends, or both)

name: animation-iteration-count
desc: Specifies the number of times an animation should be played

name: animation-name
desc: Specifies the name of the @keyframes animation

name: animation-play-state
desc: Specifies whether the animation is running or paused

name: animation-timing-function
desc: Specifies the speed curve of the animation

name: backdrop-filter
desc: The backdrop-filter property applies graphical effects such as blurring or color shifting to the area behind the element.

name: backface-visibility
desc: Defines whether or not the back face of an element should be visible when facing the user

name: background
desc: A shorthand property for all the background-* properties

name: background-attachment
desc: Sets whether a background image is fixed or scrolls with the rest of the page

name: background-blend-mode
desc: Specifies the blending mode of each background layer (color/image)

name: background-clip
desc: Specifies the painting area of the background

name: background-color
desc: Sets the background color of an element

name: background-image
desc: Sets one or more background images for an element

name: background-origin
desc: Specifies where the background image(s) is/are positioned

name: background-position
desc: Sets the starting position of a background image(s)

name: background-repeat
desc: Sets how a background image will be repeated

name: background-size
desc: Specifies the size of the background images

name: block-size
desc: Sets the size of an element

name: border
desc: A shorthand property for all the border-* properties

name: border-block
desc: A shorthand property for the border-block-width, border-block-style, and border-block-color properties

name: border-block-color
desc: Specifies the color of the border on one side of an element

name: border-block-end
desc: A shorthand property for the border-block-end-width, border-block-end-style, and border-block-end-color properties

name: border-block-end-color
desc: Specifies the color of the border on the end of an element

name: border-block-end-style
desc: Specifies the style of the border on the end of an element

name: border-block-end-width
desc: Specifies the width of the border on the end of an element

name: border-block-start
desc: A shorthand property for the border-block-start-width, border-block-start-style, and border-block-start-color properties

name: border-block-start-color
desc: Specifies the color of the border on the start of an element

name: border-block-start-style
desc: Specifies the style of the border on the start of an element

name: border-block-start-width
desc: Specifies the width of the border on the start of an element

name: border-block-style
desc: Specifies the style of the border on one side of an element

name: border-block-width
desc: Specifies the width of the border on one side of an element

name: border-bottom
desc: A shorthand property for the border-bottom-width, border-bottom-style, and border-bottom-color properties

name: border-bottom-color
desc: Specifies the color of the bottom border of an element

name: border-bottom-left-radius
desc: Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-left corner

name: border-bottom-right-radius
desc: Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-right corner

name: border-bottom-style
desc: Specifies the style of the bottom border of an element

name: border-bottom-width
desc: Specifies the width of the bottom border of an element

name: border-collapse
desc: Specifies whether table borders should collapse into a single border or be separated

name: border-color
desc: Sets the color of the four borders

name: border-end-end-radius
desc: Defines the shape of the border of the end-side of the end edge of the box

name: border-end-start-radius
desc: Defines the shape of the border of the start-side of the end edge of the box

name: border-image
desc: A shorthand property for all the border-image-* properties

name: border-image-outset
desc: Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box

name: border-image-repeat
desc: Specifies whether the border image should be repeated, rounded or stretched

name: border-image-slice
desc: Specifies how to slice the border image

name: border-image-source
desc: Specifies the path to the image to be used as a border

name: border-image-width
desc: Specifies the width of the border image

name: border-inline
desc: A shorthand property for the border-inline-width, border-inline-style, and border-inline-color properties

name: border-inline-color
desc: Specifies the color of the border on one side of an element

name: border-inline-end
desc: A shorthand property for the border-inline-end-width, border-inline-end-style, and border-inline-end-color properties

name: border-inline-end-color
desc: Specifies the color of the border on the end of an element

name: border-inline-end-style
desc: Specifies the style of the border on the end of an element

name: border-inline-end-width
desc: Specifies the width of the border on the end of an element

name: border-inline-start
desc: A shorthand property for the border-inline-start-width, border-inline-start-style, and border-inline-start-color properties

name: border-inline-start-color
desc: Specifies the color of the border on the start of an element

name: border-inline-start-style
desc: Specifies the style of the border on the start of an element

name: border-inline-start-width
desc: Specifies the width of the border on the start of an element

name: border-inline-style
desc: Specifies the style of the border on one side of an element

name: border-inline-width
desc: Specifies the width of the border on one side of an element

name: border-left
desc: A shorthand property for the border-left-width, border-left-style, and border-left-color properties

name: border-left-color
desc: Specifies the color of the left border of an element

name: border-left-style
desc: Specifies the style of the left border of an element

name: border-left-width
desc: Specifies the width of the left border of an element

name: border-radius
desc: A shorthand property for all the four border-*-radius properties

name: border-right
desc: A shorthand property for the border-right-width, border-right-style, and border-right-color properties

name: border-right-color
desc: Specifies the color of the right border of an element

name: border-right-style
desc: Specifies the style of the right border of an element

name: border-right-width
desc: Specifies the width of the right border of an element

name: border-spacing
desc: Specifies the distance between the borders of adjacent cells

name: border-start-end-radius
desc: Defines the shape of the border of the end-side of the start edge of the box

name: border-start-start-radius
desc: Defines the shape of the border of the start-side of the start edge of the box

name: border-style
desc: Sets the style of the four borders

name: border-top
desc: A shorthand property for the border-top-width, border-top-style, and border-top-color properties

name: border-top-color
desc: Specifies the color of the top border of an element

name: border-top-left-radius
desc: Defines the shape of the border of the top-left corner

name: border-top-right-radius
desc: Defines the shape of the border of the top-right corner

name: border-top-style
desc: Specifies the style of the top border of an element

name: border-top-width
desc: Specifies the width of the top border of an element

name: border-width
desc: Sets the width of the four borders

name: bottom
desc: Specifies the bottom position of a positioned element

name: box-decoration-break
desc: Specifies how the background, padding, border, border image, and box shadow of an element should be broken across multiple lines

name: box-shadow
desc: Attaches one or more shadows to an element

name: box-sizing
desc: Specifies whether the width and height of an element includes padding and border, or just the content

name: break-after
desc: Specifies the page-, column-, or region-break behavior after the generated box

name: break-before
desc: Specifies the page-, column-, or region-break behavior before the generated box

name: break-inside
desc: Specifies the page-, column-, or region-break behavior inside the generated box

name: caption-side
desc: Specifies the placement of a table caption

name: caret-color
desc: Specifies the color of the cursor (caret) in inputs, textareas, or any element that is editable

name: clear
desc: Specifies the positioning of the element concerning floating objects

name: clip
desc: Clips an absolutely positioned element

name: clip-path
desc: Clips an element to a basic shape or to an SVG path

name: color
desc: Sets the color of text

name: column-count
desc: Specifies the number of columns an element should be divided into

name: column-fill
desc: Specifies how to fill columns

name: column-gap
desc: Specifies the gap between the columns

name: column-rule
desc: A shorthand property for setting all the column-rule-* properties

name: column-rule-color
desc: Specifies the color of the rule between columns

name: column-rule-style
desc: Specifies the style of the rule between columns

name: column-rule-width
desc: Specifies the width of the rule between columns

name: column-span
desc: Specifies how many columns an element should span across

name: column-width
desc: Specifies the width of the columns

name: columns
desc: A shorthand property for setting column-width and column-count

name: content
desc: Inserts generated content

name: counter-increment
desc: Increments one or more counters

name: counter-reset
desc: Creates or resets one or more counters

name: cursor
desc: Specifies the mouse cursor to be displayed when pointing over an element

name: direction
desc: Specifies the text direction/writing direction

name: display
desc: Specifies how a certain HTML element should be displayed

name: empty-cells
desc: Specifies whether or not to display borders and background on empty cells in a table

name: filter
desc: Defines effects (e.g. blurring or color shifting) on an element before the element is displayed

name: flex
desc: Specifies the length of the item, relative to the rest

name: flex-basis
desc: Specifies the initial length of a flexible item

name: flex-direction
desc: Specifies the direction of the flexible items

name: flex-flow
desc: A shorthand property for the flex-direction and the flex-wrap properties

name: flex-grow
desc: Specifies how much the item will grow relative to the rest

name: flex-shrink
desc: Specifies how the item will shrink relative to the rest

name: flex-wrap
desc: Specifies whether the flexible items should wrap or not

name: float
desc: Specifies whether or not a box should float

name: flood-color
desc: Specifies the color of the 'flood fill' paint server

name: flood-opacity
desc: Specifies the opacity of the 'flood fill' paint server

name: font
desc: A shorthand property for the font-style, font-variant, font-weight, font-size/line-height, and the font-family properties

name: font-family
desc: Specifies the font family for text

name: font-feature-settings
desc: Allows control over advanced typographic features in OpenType fonts

name: font-kerning
desc: Controls the usage of the kerning information

name: font-language-override
desc: Controls the usage of language-specific glyphs in a typeface

name: font-optical-sizing
desc: Allows control over the font's optical sizing

name: font-size
desc: Specifies the font size of text

name: font-size-adjust
desc: Preserves the readability of text when font fallback occurs

name: font-stretch
desc: Selects a normal, condensed, or expanded face from a font family

name: font-style
desc: Specifies the font style for text

name: font-synthesis
desc: Specifies the synthesis of font faces from multiple font files

name: font-variant
desc: Specifies whether or not a text should be displayed in a small-caps font

name: font-variant-caps
desc: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for capital letters

name: font-variant-east-asian
desc: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for East Asian scripts

name: font-variant-ligatures
desc: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for ligatures or the joining of characters

name: font-variant-numeric
desc: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs for numbers, fractions, and ordinal markers

name: font-variant-position
desc: Controls the usage of alternate glyphs or the display of ruby text

name: font-weight
desc: Specifies the weight of a font

name: grid
desc: A shorthand property for the grid-template-rows, grid-template-columns, grid-template-areas, grid-auto-rows, grid-auto-columns, and the grid-auto-flow properties

name: grid-area
desc: Either specifies a name for the grid item, or this property is a shorthand property for the grid-row-start, grid-column-start, grid-row-end, and grid-column-end properties

name: grid-auto-columns
desc: Specifies the size of the columns in a grid layout

name: grid-auto-flow
desc: Specifies how auto-placed items are auto-aligned in the grid container

name: grid-auto-rows
desc: Specifies the size of the rows in a grid layout

name: grid-column
desc: A shorthand property for the grid-column-start and the grid-column-end properties

name: grid-column-end
desc: Specifies where to end the grid item

name: grid-column-gap
desc: Specifies the size of the gap between columns in a grid layout

name: grid-column-start
desc: Specifies where to place the grid item

name: grid-gap
desc: A shorthand property for the grid-row-gap and grid-column-gap properties

name: grid-row
desc: A shorthand property for the grid-row-start and the grid-row-end properties

name: grid-row-end
desc: Specifies where to end the grid item

name: grid-row-gap
desc: Specifies the size of the gap between rows in a grid layout

name: grid-row-start
desc: Specifies where to place the grid item

name: grid-template
desc: A shorthand property for the grid-template-rows, grid-template-columns, and grid-template-areas properties

name: grid-template-areas
desc: Specifies how to display columns and rows, using named grid items

name: grid-template-columns
desc: Specifies the size of the columns in a grid layout

name: grid-template-rows
desc: Specifies the size of the rows in a grid layout

name: hanging-punctuation
desc: Specifies whether a punctuation character may be placed outside the line box

name: height
desc: Sets the height of an element

name: hyphens
desc: Sets how to split words to improve the layout of paragraphs

name: image-orientation
desc: Specifies a rotation in the right or clockwise direction that a user agent applies to an image

name: image-rendering
desc: Gives a hint to the browser about what aspects of an image are most important to preserve when the image is scaled

name: image-resolution
desc: Specifies the intrinsic resolution of all raster images used in or on the element

name: initial-letter
desc: Specifies the number of lines of the text content that will be applied an initial letter styling

name: initial-letter-align
desc: Specifies the alignment of the ::first-letter pseudo-element within the flow of the ::first-line pseudo-element

name: inline-size
desc: Sets the inline size of a block container

name: inset
desc: Shorthand property for the top, right, bottom, and left properties

name: inset-block
desc: Sets the inset block start and inset block end of a box

name: inset-block-end
desc: Specifies a margin inset from the bottom edge of the element's containing block

name: inset-block-start
desc: Specifies a margin inset from the top edge of the element's containing block

name: inset-inline
desc: Sets the inset inline start and inset inline end of a box

name: inset-inline-end
desc: Specifies a margin inset from the right edge of the element's containing block

name: inset-inline-start
desc: Specifies a margin inset from the left edge of the element's containing block

name: isolation
desc: Creates a new stacking context

name: justify-content
desc: Aligns flex items along the main axis of the current line of the flex container

name: justify-items
desc: Aligns the items inside a flexible container

name: justify-self
desc: Aligns the selected items inside a flexible container

name: left
desc: Specifies the left position of a positioned element

name: letter-spacing
desc: Increases or decreases the space between characters in a text

name: line-break
desc: Specifies how/if to break lines

name: line-height
desc: Sets the line height

name: line-height-step
desc: Sets the amount of leading for the nearest block container

name: list-style
desc: Sets all the properties for a list in one declaration

name: list-style-image
desc: Specifies an image as the list-item marker

name: list-style-position
desc: Specifies the position of the list-item markers

name: list-style-type
desc: Specifies the type of list-item marker

name: margin
desc: Sets the margin for all four sides of an element

name: margin-block
desc: Sets the margin for the start and end of an element

name: margin-block-end
desc: Sets the margin at the end of an element

name: margin-block-start
desc: Sets the margin at the start of an element

name: margin-bottom
desc: Sets the bottom margin of an element

name: margin-inline
desc: Sets the margin for the start and end of an element

name: margin-inline-end
desc: Sets the margin at the end of an element

name: margin-inline-start
desc: Sets the margin at the start of an element

name: margin-left
desc: Sets the left margin of an element

name: margin-right
desc: Sets the right margin of an element

name: margin-top
desc: Sets the top margin of an element

name: marker
desc: Used to specify the marker for all::marker pseudo-elements

name: marker-end
desc: Specifies the arrowhead or polymarker that shall be drawn at the final vertex of an open path

name: marker-mid
desc: Specifies the arrowhead or polymarker that shall be drawn at every vertex other than the first and last vertex of open paths

name: marker-start
desc: Specifies the arrowhead or polymarker that shall be drawn at the first vertex of an open path

name: mask
desc: Sets or retrieves the mask layer image of an element

name: mask-border-mode
desc: Specifies the blending mode used to apply the mask

name: mask-border-outset
desc: Specifies the amount by which the mask image is scaled inwards

name: mask-border-repeat
desc: Specifies how mask images are tiled

name: mask-border-slice
desc: Specifies the inward offsets of the mask border

name: mask-border-source
desc: Specifies the mask image to use

name: mask-border-width
desc: Specifies the width of the mask border

name: mask-clip
desc: Determines the mask painting area, which is the region that is affected by the mask

name: mask-composite
desc: Specifies how the masked image or video should be combined with the mask

name: mask-image
desc: Specifies which image or images should be used as the mask layer(s) for an element

name: mask-mode
desc: Specifies the blending mode between the mask layer(s) and the masked image or video

name: mask-origin
desc: Specifies the origin of the mask positioning area

name: mask-position
desc: Specifies the initial position of the mask layer(s) relative to its border-box

name: mask-repeat
desc: Specifies how the mask image is tiled

name: mask-size
desc: Specifies the size of the mask images

name: mask-type
desc: Specifies if a mask is used, and if so, whether the mask is a luminance or an alpha mask

name: max-block-size
desc: Specifies the maximum block size of a block-level element

name: max-height
desc: Sets the maximum height of an element

name: max-inline-size
desc: Sets the maximum inline size of a block-level element

name: max-width
desc: Sets the maximum width of an element

name: min-block-size
desc: Specifies the minimum block size of a block-level element

name: min-height
desc: Sets the minimum height of an element

name: min-inline-size
desc: Sets the minimum inline size of a block-level element

name: min-width
desc: Sets the minimum width of an element

name: mix-blend-mode
desc: Specifies how an element's content should blend with its direct parent background

name: object-fit
desc: Specifies how the contents of a replaced element should be fitted to the box established by its used height and width

name: object-position
desc: Specifies the alignment of the replaced element inside its box

name: offset
desc: Sets the position of the element according to the nearest positioned ancestor or the initial containing block

name: offset-anchor
desc: Sets the position of the offset reference area

name: offset-distance
desc: Sets the distance between the element and its nearest positioned ancestor or the initial containing block

name: offset-path
desc: Sets the type of motion path used to alter the element's offset position

name: offset-position
desc: Sets the position of the element along the path defined by 'offset-path'

name: offset-rotate
desc: Sets the rotation angle of the element around a rotation center defined by 'offset-rotation-anchor'

name: offset-rotation
desc: Sets the rotation angle of the element

name: opacity
desc: Sets the opacity level for an element

name: order
desc: Sets the order of the flexible item, relative to the rest

name: orphans
desc: Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the bottom of a page when breaking a page

name: outline
desc: Sets all the outline properties in one declaration

name: outline-color
desc: Sets the color of the outline around a element

name: outline-offset
desc: Offsets an outline, and draws it beyond the border edge

name: outline-style
desc: Sets the style of the outline around an element

name: outline-width
desc: Sets the width of the outline around an element

name: overflow
desc: Specifies what should happen if content overflows an element's box

name: overflow-anchor
desc: Determines what box's position triggers the scroll of the current overflow container

name: overflow-block
desc: Determines how block overflow behaves inside block-level elements

name: overflow-clip-box
desc: Determines how the painting area of an element is determined

name: overflow-inline
desc: Determines how inline overflow behaves inside block-level elements

name: overflow-wrap
desc: Specifies whether or not the browser should insert line breaks within words to prevent text from overflowing its content box

name: overflow-x
desc: Specifies whether or not to clip the left/right edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

name: overflow-y
desc: Specifies whether or not to clip the top/bottom edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area

name: overscroll-behavior
desc: Specifies whether an element is allowed to scroll past its maximum and minimum limits

name: overscroll-behavior-block
desc: Specifies whether an element is allowed to scroll past its block boundary

name: overscroll-behavior-inline
desc: Specifies whether an element is allowed to scroll past its inline boundary

name: overscroll-behavior-x
desc: Specifies whether an element is allowed to scroll past its maximum and minimum limits on the horizontal axis

name: overscroll-behavior-y
desc: Specifies whether an element is allowed to scroll past its maximum and minimum limits on the vertical axis

name: padding
desc: Sets the padding for all four sides of an element

name: padding-block
desc: Sets the padding for the start and end of an element

name: padding-block-end
desc: Sets the padding at the end of an element

name: padding-block-start
desc: Sets the padding at the start of an element

name: padding-bottom
desc: Sets the bottom padding of an element

name: padding-inline
desc: Sets the padding for the start and end of an element

name: padding-inline-end
desc: Sets the padding at the end of an element

name: padding-inline-start
desc: Sets the padding at the start of an element

name: padding-left
desc: Sets the left padding of an element

name: padding-right
desc: Sets the right padding of an element

name: padding-top
desc: Sets the top padding of an element

name: page
desc: Sets various page-breaking properties

name: page-break-after
desc: Sets the page-breaking behavior after an element

name: page-break-before
desc: Sets the page-breaking behavior before an element

name: page-break-inside
desc: Sets the page-breaking behavior inside an element

name: paint-order
desc: Sets the order for rendering the fill, stroke, and markers of SVG shapes

name: perspective
desc: Specifies the perspective on how 3D elements are viewed

name: perspective-origin
desc: Specifies the bottom position of 3D elements

name: place-content
desc: Shorthand for align-content and justify-content

name: place-items
desc: Aligns items along both the block and inline directions

name: place-self
desc: Aligns a single item in a flexible container

name: pointer-events
desc: Specifies whether or not an element reacts to pointer events

name: position
desc: Specifies the type of positioning method used for an element (static, relative, absolute, fixed, or sticky)

name: quotes
desc: Sets the type of quotation marks for embedded quotations

name: resize
desc: Specifies whether or not an element is resizable by the user

name: right
desc: Specifies the right position of a positioned element

name: rotate
desc: Rotates an element around a fixed point on the 2D plane

name: row-gap
desc: Specifies the size of the gap between rows

name: ruby-align
desc: Sets the position of the ruby text within an element

name: ruby-merge
desc: Specifies whether a ruby element can be merged with other ruby elements

name: ruby-position
desc: Sets the position of the ruby text within an element

name: scale
desc: Increases or decreases the size of an element

name: scroll-behavior
desc: Specifies the smoothness of a scrolling element

name: scroll-margin
desc: Specifies the margin for the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-margin-block
desc: Specifies the block size of the margin of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-margin-block-end
desc: Specifies the margin at the end of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-margin-block-start
desc: Specifies the margin at the start of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-margin-bottom
desc: Specifies the bottom margin of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-margin-inline
desc: Specifies the inline size of the margin of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-margin-inline-end
desc: Specifies the margin at the end of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-margin-inline-start
desc: Specifies the margin at the start of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-margin-left
desc: Specifies the left margin of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-margin-right
desc: Specifies the right margin of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-margin-top
desc: Specifies the top margin of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-padding
desc: Specifies the padding for the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-padding-block
desc: Specifies the block size of the padding of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-padding-block-end
desc: Specifies the padding at the end of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-padding-block-start
desc: Specifies the padding at the start of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-padding-bottom
desc: Specifies the bottom padding of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-padding-inline
desc: Specifies the inline size of the padding of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-padding-inline-end
desc: Specifies the padding at the end of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-padding-inline-start
desc: Specifies the padding at the start of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-padding-left
desc: Specifies the left padding of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-padding-right
desc: Specifies the right padding of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-padding-top
desc: Specifies the top padding of the element that is used for scrolling

name: scroll-snap-align
desc: Specifies how an element's scroll snap container behaves when scrolling reaches the snap position

name: scroll-snap-stop
desc: Specifies whether the scroll container will stop on the nearest element or not

name: scroll-snap-type
desc: Specifies how an element's scroll snap points are defined

name: scrollbar-color
desc: Sets the color of the scrollbar track and thumb

name: scrollbar-gutter
desc: Specifies whether or not to reserve space for the scrollbar

name: scrollbar-width
desc: Sets the width of the scrollbar

name: shape-image-threshold
desc: Sets the alpha channel threshold used to extract a shape from an image

name: shape-margin
desc: Adds a margin to a shape-outside

name: shape-outside
desc: Specifies a shape to wrap content around

name: shape-rendering
desc: Sets the quality of text and shape antialiasing when displayed

name: size
desc: Specifies the width and height of an element

name: speak
desc: Sets whether the browser should speak the content of an element

name: src
desc: Sets the URL of the media file

name: stop-color
desc: Specifies the color of the gradient stop

name: stop-opacity
desc: Specifies the opacity of the gradient stop

name: stroke
desc: Specifies the color of the outline around a shape

name: stroke-dasharray
desc: Specifies the pattern of dashes and gaps used to paint the outline of the shape

name: stroke-dashoffset
desc: Specifies the location of the first dash on the line

name: stroke-linecap
desc: Specifies the shape to be used at the end of open subpaths when they are stroked

name: stroke-linejoin
desc: Specifies the shape to be used at the corners of paths or basic shapes when they are stroked

name: stroke-miterlimit
desc: Specifies the maximum miter length

name: stroke-opacity
desc: Specifies the opacity of the outline on the current object

name: stroke-width
desc: Specifies the width of the outline on the current object

name: tab-size
desc: Specifies the length of the tab-character

name: table-layout
desc: Sets the algorithm used to lay out table cells, rows, and columns

name: text-align
desc: Specifies the horizontal alignment of text

name: text-align-last
desc: Describes how the last line of a block or a line right before a forced line break is aligned when 'text-align' is 'justify'

name: text-anchor
desc: Sets the alignment of the text relative to a given point

name: text-combine-upright
desc: Specifies the combination of multiple characters into the space of a single character

name: text-decoration
desc: Specifies the decoration added to text

name: text-decoration-color
desc: Specifies the color of the text-decoration

name: text-decoration-line
desc: Specifies the type of line in a text-decoration

name: text-decoration-style
desc: Specifies the style of the line in a text decoration

name: text-decoration-thickness
desc: Specifies the line thickness of the decoration line

name: text-emphasis
desc: Applies an emphasis mark to a text element

name: text-emphasis-color
desc: Specifies the color of the text-emphasis

name: text-emphasis-position
desc: Specifies the position of the text-emphasis

name: text-emphasis-style
desc: Specifies the style of the text-emphasis

name: text-indent
desc: Specifies the indentation of the first line in a text-block

name: text-justify
desc: Specifies the justification method used when text-align is 'justify'

name: text-orientation
desc: Specifies the orientation of the text in a line

name: text-overflow
desc: Specifies how overflowed content that is not displayed should be signaled to the user

name: text-rendering
desc: Specifies how to optimize the fonts when rendering text

name: text-shadow
desc: Adds shadow to text

name: text-transform
desc: Controls the capitalization of text

name: text-underline-position
desc: Specifies the position of the underline which is set using the text-decoration property

name: top
desc: Specifies the top position of a positioned element

name: touch-action
desc: Specifies whether or not an element should respond to touchscreen interactions

name: transform
desc: Applies a 2D or 3D transformation to an element

name: transform-box
desc: Defines the layout box to which the transform and transform-origin properties relate

name: transform-origin
desc: Allows you to change the position on transformed elements

name: transform-style
desc: Specifies how nested elements are rendered in 3D space

name: transition
desc: A shorthand property for setting the four transition properties

name: transition-delay
desc: Specifies when the transition effect will start

name: transition-duration
desc: Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds a transition effect takes to complete

name: transition-property
desc: Specifies the name of the CSS property the transition effect is for

name: transition-timing-function
desc: Specifies the speed curve of the transition effect

name: translate
desc: Moves an element along the X and Y axis

name: unicode-bidi
desc: Specifies the level of embedding with respect to the bidirectional algorithm

name: user-select
desc: Specifies whether the user can select text

name: vector-effect
desc: Specifies whether or not the final rendering of SVG graphics elements is done with anti-aliasing

name: vertical-align
desc: Specifies the vertical alignment of the content in an inline element or table-cell box

name: visibility
desc: Specifies whether or not an element is visible

name: white-space
desc: Specifies how white-space inside an element is handled

name: widows
desc: Sets the minimum number of lines that must be left at the bottom of a page when a page break occurs inside an element

name: width
desc: Sets the width of an element

name: will-change
desc: Specifies the property or properties to which a transform will be applied

name: word-break
desc: Specifies where to break lines within words

name: word-spacing
desc: Increases or decreases the space between words in a text

name: word-wrap
desc: Allows long, unbreakable words to be broken and wrap to the next line

name: writing-mode
desc: Specifies whether lines of text are laid out horizontally or vertically, and the direction in which blocks progress

name: x
desc: Defines the x-coordinate of an element

name: y
desc: Defines the y-coordinate of an element

name: z-index
desc: Sets the stack order of a positioned element

name: @font-face
desc: A rule that allows websites to download and use fonts other than the "web-safe" fonts

name: @font-feature-values
desc: Allows authors to use a common name in font-variant-alternate for feature activated differently in OpenType

name: @import
desc: Allows you to import a style sheet into another style sheet

name: @keyframes
desc: Specifies the animation code

name: @charset
desc: Specifies the character encoding used in the style sheet

name: @media
desc: Sets the style rules for different media types/devices/sizes

name: attr()
desc: Returns the value of an attribute of the selected element

name: calc()
desc: Allows you to perform calculations to determine CSS property values

name: conic-gradient()
desc: Creates a conic gradient

name: counter()
desc: Returns the current value of the named counter

name: cubic-bezier()
desc: Defines a Cubic Bezier curve

name: hsl()
desc: Defines colors using the Hue-Saturation-Lightness model (HSL)

name: hsla()
desc: Defines colors using the Hue-Saturation-Lightness-Alpha model (HSLA)

name: linear-gradient()
desc: Creates a linear gradient

name: max()
desc: Uses the largest value, from a comma-separated list of values, as the property value

name: min()
desc: Uses the smallest value, from a comma-separated list of values, as the property value

name: radial-gradient()
desc: Creates a radial gradient

name: repeating-conic-gradient()
desc: Repeats a conic gradient

name: repeating-linear-gradient()
desc: Repeats a linear gradient

name: repeating-radial-gradient()
desc: Repeats a radial gradient

name: rgb()
desc: Defines colors using the Red-Green-Blue model (RGB)

name: rgba()
desc: Defines colors using the Red-Green-Blue-Alpha model (RGBA)

name: var()
desc: Inserts the value of a custom property

name: cm
desc: Centimeters

name: mm
desc: Milimeters

name: in
desc: Inches (1in = 96px = 2.54cm)

name: px
desc:
Pixels (1px = 1/96th of 1in)

Pixels (px) are relative to the viewing device. For low-dpi devices, 1px is one device pixel (dot) of the display. For printers and high resolution screens 1px implies multiple device pixels.

name: pt
desc: Points (1pt = 1/72 of 1in)

name: pc
desc: Picas (1pc = 1/72 of 1in)

name: em
desc: Relative to the font-size of the element (2em means 2 times the size of the current font)

name: ex
desc: Relative to the x-height of the current font (rarely used)

name: ch
desc: Relative to the width of the "0" (zero)

name: rem
desc: Relative to font-size of the root element

name: vw
desc:
Relative to 1% of the width of the viewport

Viewport = the browser window size. If the viewport is 50cm wide, 1vw = 0.5cm.

name: vh
desc:
Relative to 1% of the height of the viewport

Viewport = the browser window size. If the viewport is 50cm wide, 1vw = 0.5cm.

name: vmin
desc:
Relative to 1% of viewport's smaller dimension

Viewport = the browser window size. If the viewport is 50cm wide, 1vw = 0.5cm.

name: vmax
desc:
Relative to 1% of viewport's larger dimension

Viewport = the browser window size. If the viewport is 50cm wide, 1vw = 0.5cm.
Relative to the parent element

name: @keyframes
desc:
